channel.title: Need help with shop
channel.description:
how do i make it so when you click on "talk to" or what ever, it brings up the window and the stuff in its shop? i just made a shop but im not that good with shops lol..
[b]*I edited something*[/b]

item.title: Need help with shop
item.dc:creator: @_R_E_B_O_R_N ~R E B O R N~
item.description:
@_R_E_B_O_R_N wrote:

well heres what i have:

shop = 43	@whi@Food @gre@shop				1	1	318	1000	315	1000	2514	1000	359	1000	361	1000	379	1000	377	1000	371	1000	373	1000	383	1000	385	1000	397	1000	395	1000	389	1000	391	1000			
spawn = 794	2477	3319	0	2477	3319	2477	3319	1	Buy_your_food_here

} else if (NPCID == 794) { // Food shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43;
but it still isnt bring up the shop interface thing with the items when i click “Talk-To” NPC name, or what ever. im using Charlie the cook as the npc if that helps…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with shop
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

First, autospawn your NPC.
Open shops.cfg.
Copy this and paste it before the [END]

shop = ID	@COLOR@Name			1	1	ITEM	AMOUNT

Rename the ID to something UNDER 100, and something not being used by another shop. The color is the color of the shop name, Name is it’s name (duh), ITEM is one item’s ID, AMOUNT is the amount of the item you just made available.
Open client.java, search for

wanneshop =

See stuff like this

else if (NPCID == 1) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ...; }

Press enter after one of the }'s and add

else if (NPCID == NPC) { //... PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ID; }

Change the NPC to the NPC ID of the spawned shop seller, the ID is the ID of the shop you made in shops.cfg.
Simple enough, or need more?

Read full topic
